sections.heading: Use of municipal revenue powers to provide monies for project9-441
sections.text: 07.Use of municipal revenue powers to provide monies for projectEvery municipality may use its monies for the purposes of aiding in the planning, undertaking or carrying out of a housing development project in its area of operations.
